title: [Sponsor] Oh Dear
content:
Every time your website is unavailable, you could be losing out on revenue. Whether you have a webshop or just an informational site, if potential visitors can’t reach it, they’ll move on to the next one.

After all, when was the last time you waited more than a few seconds for a page to load before cancelling and trying the next search result?

At Oh Dear, we offer peace of mind as a service. When your website is unavailable, slow or contains broken pages, we’ll let you know through email, SMS, Slack, webhooks, … you name it.

We’re not your average website monitor. We are the all-in-one service to give you complete website coverage. DF readers will appreciate the high level of care that’s given to the UI and UX of Oh Dear.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
